channel.title: Financially Intelligent Parent Podcast
channel.description: Practical advice to help parents raise responsible, generous and successful children. From family and money experts Eileen Gallo, Ph.D., and Jon Gallo, J.D., authors of The Financially Intelligent Parent book. For more parenting tips and tools, please visit www.FIParent.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: 8 Steps to raising successful, generous and responsible children, from famlies and money experts Eileen Gallo, Ph.D., and Jon Gallo, J.D., authors of The Financially Intelligent Parent.
channel.itunes:author: Dan Safkow
channel.itunes:summary: Practical advice to help parents raise responsible, generous and successful children. From family and money experts Eileen Gallo, Ph.D., and Jon Gallo, J.D., authors of The Financially Intelligent Parent book. For more parenting tips and tools, please visit www.FIParent.com.

item.title: Don't use Allowances as a Reward or Punishment - FIP Minute #8
item.description: Parenting Minutes are presented by children and money experts Eileen Gallo, Ph.D., and Jon Gallo, J.D., authors of The Financially Intelligent Parent: 8 Steps to raising successful, generous and responsible children. Parenting Minutes are available free to parenting podcasts, radio shows and websites. Contact Dan Safkow at 949-394-4742 for details.
item.dc:creator: Dan Safkow
item.itunes:summary:
Parenting Minutes are presented by children and money experts Eileen Gallo, Ph.D., and Jon Gallo, J.D., authors of The Financially Intelligent Parent: 8 Steps to raising successful, generous and responsible children.
Parenting Minutes are available free to parenting podcasts, radio shows and websites. Contact Dan Safkow at 949-394-4742 for details.
